Package cloud.elit.sdk

Class DecodeComponent<I,O,P extends Parameters>

  • Type Parameters:

    O -

    public abstract class DecodeComponent<I,O,P extends Parameters>
extends Component<I,O,P>
    This abstract class is inherited by components used for decoding, but not for training.

      • save

        public void save​(java.lang.String model_path,
                 P params)
        Saves a trained model to the specific directory for this component.
        Specified by:
        save in class Component<I,O,P extends Parameters>
        Parameters:
        model_path - the path to the directory where the model is saved.
        params - custom parameters.

      • train

        public void train​(java.util.List<I> trn_data,
                  java.util.List<I> dev_data,
                  P params)
        Trains a model using the training and the development data. It is also responsible to set this component with the final model so it can be saved by Component.save(String, Parameters).
        Specified by:
        train in class Component<I,O,P extends Parameters>
        Parameters:
        trn_data - the training data (required).
        dev_data - the development data (optional).
        params - custom parameters.
